text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Congrats, Brian. That was some<n>incredible running.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Congrats, Brian. That was some<n>incredible running.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
It sure felt like it. That might've been<n>the best I've ever
done.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: After all, it was the most I've ever<n>wanted to win.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I think the last couple of races pushed<n>you to grow in a way
the victories<n>didn't.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I think the last couple of races pushed<n>you to grow in a way
the victories<n>didn't.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but I'm not going to stop here.<n>My urge to run is what
I'll use to<n>propel me forward.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Ahead of me is where my sister's<n>waiting. She's the
person I still need<n>to defeat.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can tell she really means it—her eyes<n>shine passionately
as she speaks.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So, when's my next race? I'm<n>starving!
